bibl.title: Hundred-Gated Thebes. Acts of a Colloquium on Thebes and the Theban Area in the Graeco-Roman Period. (Papyrologica Lugduno-Batava. XXVII.)
bibl.note: tabl., fac-sim., 2 cartes, 1 plan et 7 pll.
Leiden, 9-11 September 1992. - P. viii: Concordances [doc. 1-23, including Greek and Egyptian inscriptions, coffins, etc.]. - Pp. 266-271: Index of Papyrological Sources (Greek and Egyptian).
VLEEMING S.P. (Ed.), Hundred-Gated Thebes. Acts of a Colloquium on Thebes and the Theban Area in the Graeco-Roman Period. (Papyrologica Lugduno-Batava. XXVII.)
Leiden, E.J. Brill, 1995, 4°, xiii-273 pp., tabl., fac-sim., 2 cartes, 1 plan et 7 pll. ISBN 90-04-10384-8. Hfl. 170/$109.75.
